name: Save the Season (Rushed jam ver)
description:
Short Metroidvania game where you change the season to progress.

Control :

Arrow to move | Hold Up to jump higher | Z = Summer |  X = Winter | C = Spring

The season changing mechanic is still locked at the start, collect the fragment to unlock them.

just to reduce confusion you can't use that green block before unlocking the Spring, so just find another route if you haven't get that fragment

The game gonna be a bit hard after you unlock the winter, (and actually the difficulty curve is kinda broken xd) so good luck

note :

  •  You can't switch to winter if part of your body touch water
  •  50% of the game aren't decorated properly 
  • A&D also could be used to move
  • no audio (hopefully "yet")

So yeah, this is unfinished, i would expand this a bit and polish it later. for now, this is my submission to Trijam #70 - Season

Please leave a comment so i could make a better game in the future :3
